nodes.text: The Dentari sector was located in the Trans-Hydian portion of the Expansion Region. It contained the Borloria system, which was home to the sentient species known as Borlorians, and the Dentaria system, the origin point of the beverage known as the Dentarian Ripple.

By 0 ABY, the Dentari sector shared its spinward border with the Sumitra sector and its trailing border with the Farstey and Prackla sectors. Dentari also formed the Expansion Region's Rimward border with the Mid Rim's Venaarian sector as well as part of the Coreward border with the Inner Rim.
The Dentari sector was introduced in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas.
